name: Mike Boos
body:
### About me
I'm a citizen of Kitchener and the Region of Waterloo. I am a member of the executive committee of TriTAG, a co-founder of Smart Growth Waterloo Region, and chair of the Kitchener Cycling and Trails Advisory Committee. I have a MASc in Systems Design Engineering from the University of Waterloo.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
